project_descr: The purpose of this project is to provide continuing support to the establishment of a sustainable development framework for Dragash/Dragaš municipality, one of the poorest municipalities in Kosovo

outputs.output_descr: Sustainable development plans/policies effectively respond to the need of stakeholders (central & local government), as well as promote employment and environmental protection.

The purpose of this project is to provide support to the establishment of Sharrprodhimi Stewardship Authority by assisting in the formulation of an integrated development strategy as well as implementing a series of pilot activities that would contribute to creating a sustainable development framework for Dragash/Dragas municipality e.g. reducing loss of bio-diversity (Preparatory Phase: 12 months). Subject to achieving the benchmarks set out in the preparatory phase, this will be followed-up by a 3 year sustained period of implementing the strategy (Impelmentation Phase).

document_name: Dragash Year 2011 report ANNEXES FINAL V2 May 2012

project_title: preparatory assistance to sustainable develop.in dragash
